p: The SWAT model provides different methods to estimate surface runoff, evapotranspiration and channel routing (Neitsch et al. 2011). We used the SCS curve number procedure (USDA SCS 1972), the Penmanâ€“Monteith method (Monteith 1965), and variable storage coefficient method (William 1969) for the estimation of runoff, evapotranspiration and channel routing, respectively. Actual evapotranspiration was estimated based on methodology developed by Ritchie ( 1972).
